reviews.review_msg: Incredibly knowledgeable and lectures are worth it even though they can be difficult to follow sometimes. Expectations are high, but that isn't a bad thing. Make sure to read and be ready to participate including leading discussion in order to receive ANY participation marks. Go to Scott and ask questions to make sure your paper is good.
Communications resident genius. Best prof I've ever had...caring, and a great guy. Great lecturing style. Unlike any other prof at the university. don't miss taking a class with him.
